description: Industry-average allocation balancing risk and timeline
strategic_rationale: Diversified risk profile with pipeline continuity

description: Maximum early-stage volume for future optionality
strategic_rationale: Bet on high-volume screening to find winners

description: Conservative focus on high-probability late-stage assets
strategic_rationale: Minimize attrition risk, accept lower total opportunities

description: Bimodal: heavy early + late, minimal mid-stage
strategic_rationale: Avoid 'valley of death' in Phase 2, concentrate bets

description: Prioritizes fastest path to approval (late-stage heavy)
strategic_rationale: Maximize near-term approval likelihood, accept higher cost
